p: Based on these analyses and predictions, for now, Colombia could be in a better position regarding other countries for SARS-CoV-2 transmission and COVID-19 evolution, supported in early actions aimed to suppress virus transmission and the lower percentage of high-risk population for COVID-19 (older adults). The expansion, complications and mortality are highly variable, even in neighboring countries; therefore, the data cannot be extrapolated, either to the worst-case like Italy or the best case like Finland ( Table 2).
